title: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a love for technology with emphasis on end-to-end solutions. I pride myself on being able to deliver quality products that solve business problems. Being a self- starter, I can work individually or collaborate effectively in a team environment.

roles.title: Full Stack Web Developer
roles.description:
Used HTML5, Bootstrap4, CSS, Sass, jQuery, and JavaScript to build responsive web applications.
Developed back-end using Python and Flask framework.
Managed CRUD operations with SQL database.
Utilized Chrome DEV tools and Inspect/Console for debugging.
Implemented User Authentication and Authorization with Okta using OpenID Connect.
Integrated custom web app with ServiceNow APIs and Splunk APIs.
Utilized Visual Studio Code and Git repositories.
